ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The wolf continued to follow her trail, he got a partial message, Hey Lunarpine, I ll The message was cut off. He could see a storm forming in the distance.

The wolf continued to follow her trail, he got a partial message,"Hey 
Lunarpine, I'll" The message was cut off. He could see a storm 
forming in the distance. "She wouldn't." He realized yes she would go 
into a storm. If he was smart he'd find shelter, but nobody ever 
called him smart.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She flew into the electrical storm.  She faced high winds, hail and 
> snow.  She headed into the wind and kept a straight course.  She 
was 
> hit by large hail stones.  One hit her wing. She flew down and 
> landed.  She transformed into bot mode.  With her wing damaged, she 
> wouldn't be able to fly for a while.  It needed time to heal.  She 
> kept walking with her face down to help block the wind and snow.  
She 
> stopped and stood still.  She realized her emotions had gotten her 
in 
> trouble again.  Here  she was, running away from one problem and 
> getting into another one.  She came to the conclusion that she 
would 
> have to go back to the base.  She would have to face Lunarpine and 
> deal with her feelings.  She hated her emotional side.  She wanted 
to 
> get rid of it.  It always messed up her logic circuits.  She opened 
> her comm-link. 
> 
> "Hey Lunarpine. I'll...I'll...Oh never mind."  She closed her 
link.  
> She forgot about the bot trying to kill her.  She forgot about how 
> any pred could home in on her signal.  She was too deep in 
thought.  
> She started walking south, back to the mazimal base.  But since she 
> couldn't fly, it would take her a while. Especially in a storm.
